header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Setting personal goals, career professional development, discussing joining up with friends, and family planning.
header.activity: A couple talking about making life arrangements.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, requesting, making arrangements
